text:
Step 1: Compute the FV of the annuity due at the end of Year 4 (FV).
Set your calculator to the annuity due (BGN) mode, enter the relevant data, and
compute FV4.
N = 4; I/Y = 6; PMT = -1,000; CPT + FV = $4,637.09
Step 2: Find the future value of FV4 two years from Year 4.
Enter the relevant data and compute FV6.
